subject: feat: add Discover tab with randomizable metrics
body:
- 20+ metrics that can be shuffled or pinned
- Humorous file name generator for privacy (Grumpy Dragon, etc.)
- Side-by-side comparisons (Weekend vs Weekday, Features vs Bugs, etc.)
- Preferences saved to localStorage
